"I've written a few pieces for Refinery29.com and the rates have all varied depending on the content:

Medium reported international piece: $400
short breaking news reported piece: $200 
personal essay with no reporting: $250 "

"Originally wrote the piece for a smaller niche site on an assignment granted after a cold pitch; it was ultimately rejected there and shopped to R29 instead, fully written. It ran with revisions within the week, but the final version wasn't the one I'd agreed upon with the editor; more changes were made without my knowledge before it went live, and that version contains errors."
